instructions: 以左手邊的 Abstract Group為參考點，準備出發。
直走經過左手邊的Puget Systems、RapidPipeline、Wacom Technology，約 3 個攤位。
直走經過左手邊的Wacom Technology、PLASK、Lightcraft Technology，約 3 個攤位。
目的地就在前方的 Bria Visual AI Platform。

target_info.display_name: Bria Visual AI Platform: Bria Visual AI Platform

companies.name: Bria Visual AI Platform
companies.description: Bria AI is a responsible and open visual Generative AI platform for commercial use. It offers text-to-image models trained on licensed data, with source code access for scalable, on-brand content creation. Featuring a patented attribution engine and regulatory compliance, Bria serves leading brands and creative industries.
